prisonescape.game.model.actors
Class ActorAction

java.lang.Object
  prisonescape.game.model.actors.ActorAction
Direct Known Subclasses:
GuardChasingBehaviour, LimitedWalkingAction
public abstract class ActorAction
extends java.lang.Object

This class specifies the methods required for a NPC within the game, which allow for it to behave in its own way.

Since:
0.2
Version:
1.0
Author:
Sam Ward
